event.title: "I Love Free Software Day 2025" in Este, Italy

body.p: Our post I Love Free Software Day celebrations will take place in Este organised by the EsteLug on the 15th of February. Everybody is welcome and you find more information on our event webpage.

p.strong: Where: Patronato Ss. Redentore primo piano, Este (PD)

body.p: We look forward to seeing many of you on the 15th of February for our post-celebrations ♥ ♥ ♥ !

event.link: Patronato Ss. Redentore primo piano, Este (PD)
